versions.name: bukkit
versions.description: Bukkit is a free, open-source, software that provides the means to extend the popular Minecraft multiplayer server.

versions.name: spigot
versions.description: The home of Spigot a high performance, no lag customized CraftBukkit Minecraft server API.

versions.name: paper
versions.description: High performance Spigot fork that aims to fix gameplay and mechanics inconsistencies

versions.name: tunity
versions.description: Minecraft server software fork of Paper to improve performance without behavioural changes.

versions.name: airplane
versions.description: A stable, optimized, well supported 1.16.5 & 1.17 Paper fork.

versions.name: purpur
versions.description: Purpur is a drop-in replacement for Paper servers designed for configurability, new fun and exciting gameplay features, and high performance built on top of Airplane.

versions.name: flamepaper
versions.description: High performance PaperSpigot fork that aims to fix gameplay and mechanics inconsistencies

versions.name: tacospigot
versions.description: A even-higher higher performance PaperSpigot fork that adds new features.

versions.name: nachospigot
versions.description: NachoSpigot is a fork of TacoSpigot 1.8.9 that offers several enhancements to performance as well as bug fixes.

versions.name: sugarane
versions.description: Highly optimized Purpur fork focusing on stability and performance.

versions.name: dionysus
versions.description: Minecraft 1.12.2 Paper Fork designed for high player counts and anarchy.

versions.name: glowstone
versions.description: A fast, customizable and compatible open source server for Minecraft: Java Edition

versions.name: lumipaper
versions.description: Fork of the Minecraft server software Paper

versions.name: sparklypaper
versions.description: SparklyPower's Tuinity/Paper fork, with a mix of weird & crazy patches from other forks

versions.name: cloudspigot
versions.description: High performance PaperSpigot fork used by Minecraft Server Cloudz.ml.

versions.name: arcadepaper
versions.description: patch for PaperSpigot with many features.

versions.name: sportpaper
versions.description: A fork of Paper 1.8 with changes for the Stratus Network using Magnet's build system.
